title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories on the x axis representing Religion, and Percentage of population in each Religion on the y axis.
Christians is higher than any other categories with value 77.0, followed by Unaffiliated, and Jews. Down to category Muslims with the lowest value of 1.0.
The highest value at Christians is almost 77.0 times larger than the minimum value of Muslims.

The difference between the max Religion Christians and min Religion Muslims is 76.0.
